# IT Agency Website - Next.js Project

## Project Overview
A modern, professional website for an IT agency specializing in digital marketing and software development.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- React Icons

## Project Structure
- `/app` - Next.js App Router pages and layouts
- `/components` - Reusable UI components
- `/public` - Static assets

## Design Guidelines
- Color Palette: Blues (#0066FF, #003366), Blacks (#0A0A0A, #1A1A1A), Whites (#FFFFFF, #F5F5F5), Accent (#00D4FF)
- Modern fonts with bold headings
- Subtle gradients and hover animations
- Smooth scrolling navigation

## Development Commands
- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run start` - Start production server
